enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve manipulating the internal state of the ValidatorResults object, specifically the hResults map.
Both methods update the internal state of the ValidatorResults object by adding or merging results.
The add method stores results in the hResults map, and getValidatorResult retrieves them, making it a natural candidate for assertions.
After adding results, the isEmpty method can be used to assert whether the results map is empty or not.
